feed.title: Google Cloud: NetApp Volumes
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: NetApp Volumes

entry.content: The manual QoS feature is now generally available for Google Cloud NetApp Volumes, supporting the Standard, Premium, and Extreme service levels. For more information, see Manual QoS.
entry.summary: Google Cloud NetApp Volumes now supports manual QoS for Standard, Premium, and Extreme service levels.
entry.title: Feature: Manual QoS now generally available

entry.content: Selective file restore feature is now generally available for Google Cloud NetApp Volumes, supporting the Standard, Premium, and Extreme service levels. For more information, see Selective file restore.
entry.summary: Google Cloud NetApp Volumes now offers selective file restore for Standard, Premium, and Extreme service levels. This feature allows for more granular data recovery.
entry.title: Feature: Selective File Restore Now Available

entry.content: Google Cloud NetApp Volumes now supports the FlexCache feature in allow-listed General Availability (GA) for the Premium and Extreme service levels. For more information, see FlexCache.
entry.summary: Google Cloud NetApp Volumes now supports the FlexCache feature for Premium and Extreme service levels. This feature enhances data caching capabilities.
entry.title: Feature: FlexCache Feature Now Available

entry.content: The auto-tiering feature for the Flex service level is now generally available for custom-performance Flex zonal pools. For more information, see Manage auto-tiering.
entry.summary: The auto-tiering feature for the Flex service level is now generally available for custom-performance Flex zonal pools.
entry.title: Feature: Auto-tiering for Flex is now available

entry.content: Google Cloud NetApp Volumes now supports the external replication feature in allow-listed General Availability (GA) for Standard, Premium, and Extreme service levels. This feature uses bi-directional SnapMirror to replicate data between ONTAP-based systems and NetApp Volumes. For more information, see About external replication.
entry.summary: Google Cloud NetApp Volumes has released external replication, supporting data replication between ONTAP-based systems and NetApp Volumes using bi-directional SnapMirror.
entry.title: Feature: Google Cloud NetApp Volumes now supports external replication

entry.content: Large capacity volumes now support a maximum capacity of 3 PiB. For more information, see Large capacity volumes.
entry.summary: Large capacity volumes now support a maximum capacity of 3 PiB.
entry.title: Changed: New large capacity volumes

entry.content: For the Flex service level, the storage pool and volume now support a maximum capacity of 300 TiB. For more information, see Service levels.
entry.summary: The storage pool and volume for the Flex service level now support a maximum capacity of 300 TiB.
entry.title: Changed: Increased capacity for Flex service level

entry.content: Google Cloud NetApp Volumes now supports organization policy for Customer Managed Encryption Keys (CMEK). For more information, see CMEK organization policy.
entry.summary: Google Cloud NetApp Volumes now supports organization policy for Customer Managed Encryption Keys (CMEK).
entry.title: Feature: New CMEK Organization Policy Support

entry.content: Google Cloud NetApp Volumes is now integrated with NetApp BlueXP Connector. For more information, see NetApp Volumes integration with BlueXP.
entry.summary: Google Cloud NetApp Volumes is now integrated with NetApp BlueXP Connector.
entry.title: Feature: NetApp BlueXP Connector Integration

entry.content: Google Cloud NetApp Volumes now supports cross-project cross-region replication for Standard, Premium, and Extreme service levels. This feature is generally available for allow-listed users. For more information, see About volume replication.
entry.summary: Cross-project, cross-region replication for Google Cloud NetApp Volumes is now available.
entry.title: Feature: Google Cloud NetApp Volumes Replication

entry.content: Google Cloud NetApp Volumes now supports volume backups for large capacity volumes. This feature is now generally available. For more information, see About backups.
entry.summary: Volume backups for large capacity volumes are now available for Google Cloud NetApp Volumes.
entry.title: Feature: New Feature: Volume Backups for Large Capacity Volumes

entry.content: Google Cloud NetApp Volumes now supports multi-VPC peering for all service levels. For more information, see Connect additional networks.
entry.summary: Google Cloud NetApp Volumes now supports multi-VPC peering for all service levels.
entry.title: Feature: Multi-VPC Peering Support
